meanings.definition: A traditional Arab headdress made of a square of cloth folded into a triangle and held on the head by a cord.
meanings.sent1: He wore a red kaffiyeh to protect his head from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The kaffiyeh fluttered in the desert wind as he rode on his camel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat tried to eat the kaffiyeh off the washing line.
meanings.sent4: Her kaffiyeh of wisdom shielded her from the harsh realities of life.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the kaffiyeh brightened the marketplace.
